scripts.node: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli run
scripts.node:inspect: bun run check-ts && bun run --inspect ./packages/cli run
scripts.identity:info: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities info
scripts.identity:stake: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities stake
scripts.identity:unstake: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities unstake
scripts.identity:withdraw: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities withdraw
scripts.planet: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli run --network planet
scripts.planet:info: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities info --offline --network planet
scripts.planet:stake: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities stake --network planet
scripts.planet:unstake: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities unstake --network planet
scripts.planet:withdraw: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities withdraw --network planet
scripts.testnet: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli run --network testnet
scripts.testnet:info: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities info --offline --network testnet
scripts.testnet:stake: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities stake --network testnet
scripts.testnet:unstake: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities unstake --network testnet
scripts.testnet:withdraw: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities withdraw --network testnet
scripts.devnet: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli run --network devnet
scripts.devnet:info: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities info --offline --network devnet
scripts.devnet:stake: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities stake --network devnet
scripts.devnet:unstake: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities unstake --network devnet
scripts.devnet:withdraw: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli identities withdraw --network devnet
scripts.validate: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli validate
scripts.tools: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli tools
scripts.init: bun run check-ts && bun run ./packages/cli init
